title: Sunday Morning Worship
description: Join us for uplifting worship, heartfelt prayer, and a message from God's Word. Children's ministry available for ages 0-12 during both services.

title: Wednesday Bible Study
description: Dive deeper into Scripture with our midweek Bible study. Currently studying the book of Romans. Open to all ages and experience levels.

title: Spring Community Outreach
description: Serve our community together! We'll be partnering with local organizations to provide meals, clothing, and supplies to families in need.

title: Youth Group Friday Night
description: A fun, safe space for teens (grades 6-12) to build friendships, play games, and grow in faith together.

title: Easter Celebration Service
description: Celebrate the resurrection of Jesus Christ with special music, an inspiring message, and family activities. Invite your friends and neighbors!

title: Women's Prayer Breakfast
description: Ladies, join us for a morning of fellowship, prayer, and encouragement. Breakfast provided. Guest speaker: Pastor Linda Morrison.

title: Men's Fellowship Cookout
description: Men of all ages are invited for good food, fellowship, and an encouraging devotional. Bring a friend!

title: Vacation Bible School
description: An exciting week of Bible stories, crafts, games, and music for children ages 4-12. Registration opens April 1st.
